Class Bindings

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.bind.Bindings

  • @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public final class Bindings
extends java.lang.Object
    A static utility class for binding.

    • Method Detail

      • schemeOf

        @Nonnull
public static java.lang.String schemeOf(java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Retrieves the URI scheme for the speficied type.

        The type must be annotated with FactoryBinding, or implements BackendFactory.

        Parameters:
        type - the type
        Returns:
        the URI scheme
        Throws:
        BindingException - if no scheme is defined for this type

      • schemeOf

        Parameters:
        factory - the factory
        Returns:
        the URI scheme
        Throws:
        BindingException - if no scheme is defined for this type

      • find

        @Nonnull
public static <T> T find(java.lang.Class<? super T> type,
                                  java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Class<? extends BackendFactory>,java.lang.String> valueMapping,
                                  java.lang.String value,
                                  @Nullable
                                  java.lang.String variant)
        Retrieves the instance of the type that is bound to a BackendFactory with the given value, by using the speficied valueMapping.

        The type must be annotated with FactoryBinding.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the instance
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the instance to look for
        valueMapping - the mapping function to retrieve the value from the factory bound by the annotation
        value - the value to look for
        variant - the variant to look for
        Returns:
        a new instance of the type
        Throws:
        BindingException - if no instance of type is found for the value by using the valueMapping
        See Also:
        ServiceProvider.load(Class)
